entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as parading around the living-room in his brand-new uniform, which suggests that he is now attending Smeltings school.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as saying that it was the proudest moment of his life when Dudley put on his new uniform.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia bursts into tears and says she can't believe it's her Ickle Dudleykins, which suggests that she is proud of Dudley's growth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as trying not to laugh at Dudley's new uniform.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon says that it was the proudest moment of his life when Dudley put on his new uniform.
Aunt Petunia bursts into tears and says she can't believe it's her Ickle Dudleykins, which suggests that she is proud of Dudley's growth.
Harry tries not to laugh at Dudley's new uniform.
